KOTAK.SC Entry: This will be generated by SAP post upload
KOTAK.Transaction Type: Transaction type should be A for upload
KOTAK.SPL Code: Region wise TL SPL code to be added
KOTAK.Acquirer:
acquirer to be as per file name for.

ex: if file name is kotak_master then acquirer to be KOTAK in upper case
KOTAK.Subject: Status
KOTAK.Item Code: As per model code in Item Master
KOTAK.Item Name: As per model code in Item Master
KOTAK.Item Description: As per model code in Item Master
KOTAK.Status: To be set as "Open" for Installation, Deinstallation & Service
KOTAK.POA Date: to be creation date in DDMMYYYY format

YBL.SC Entry: This will be generated by SAP post upload

COMPLAINTS.Transaction Type: Transaction type should be A for upload
COMPLAINTS.SPL Code: Region wise TL SPL code to be added
COMPLAINTS.Acquirer: please refer to the "Acquirer" column in the complaints master file
